abilities.description: Luffy stretches his leg high into the air and brings it down with tremendous force like an axe. Used to deliver the final blow to Arlong.

demonstrated.context: Shown in flashback as the finishing move that defeated Arlong and destroyed Arlong Park.

keyMoments.title: Flashback: Gomu Gomu no Ono Defeats Arlong
keyMoments.description: The flashback shows Luffy using Gomu Gomu no Ono to deliver the final blow to Arlong, sending him crashing through multiple floors and destroying Arlong Park.
keyMoments.significance: One of Luffy's most iconic early victories, demonstrating the power of his Devil Fruit abilities when combined with his determination to protect his friends.

userHistory.notes: Accidentally ate the fruit as a child
